#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
long long int t;
cin>>t;
map<string,int> mp;
map<string,int>::iterator it;
int max=-10000;
string newname;
while(t--)
{
long long int s;
string name;
cin>>name;
cin>>s;

it=mp.find(name);
if(it==mp.end())
{
mp.insert(pair<string,int> (name,s));
if(s>max)
{
    max=s;
    newname=name;
}
}
else
{
    it->second+=s;
    if(it->second>max)
    {
        newname=it->first;
    max=it->second;
    }
}

}
cout<<newname<<endl;
return 0;
}
